00039 class TileMapCategoryNotice : public TileCategory {
00040 public:   
00048    TileMapCategoryNotice(const char* catName,
00049                          int id,
00050                          int enabled,
00051                          int nbrTypes,
00052                          const TileFeature::tileFeature_t* poiTypes) :
00053       TileCategory( catName, id, enabled ),
00054       m_nbrTypes(nbrTypes),
00055       m_poiTypes(poiTypes) {
00056       // All is well that ends well.
00057    }
00058 
00059 
00061    void setEnabled( int enabled ) { m_enabled = enabled; }
00063    int getNbrTypes() const { return m_nbrTypes; }   
00065    TileFeature::tileFeature_t getType(int idx) const {
00066       return m_poiTypes[idx];
00067    }
00068    void putInSet( set<int32>& theSet ) const {
00069       theSet.insert( m_poiTypes, m_poiTypes + getNbrTypes() );
00070    }
00071    
00072 private:
00074    MC2SimpleString m_catName;
00076    int m_nbrTypes;
00078    const TileFeature::tileFeature_t* m_poiTypes;   
00079 };
00080 
00082 class TileIndex {
00083 public:
00084    typedef int ValueType;
00085 
00086    TileIndex( ValueType latIdx, ValueType lonIdx ):
00087       m_latIdx( latIdx ), m_lonIdx( lonIdx ) {
00088    }
00089 
00091    ValueType getLatIdx() const {
00092       return m_latIdx;
00093    }
00094 
00096    ValueType getLonIdx() const {
00097       return m_lonIdx;
00098    }
00099 
00101    bool operator < ( const TileIndex& other ) const {
00102       if ( getLatIdx() != other.getLatIdx() ) {
00103          return getLatIdx() < other.getLatIdx();
00104       }
00105       return getLonIdx() < other.getLonIdx();
00106    }
00107 
00109    bool operator == ( const TileIndex& other ) const {
00110       return
00111          getLatIdx() == other.getLatIdx() &&
00112          getLonIdx() == other.getLonIdx();
00113    }
00114 
00115    bool operator != ( const TileIndex& other ) const {
00116       return ! ( *this == other );
00117    }
00118 
00119 private:
00120    ValueType m_latIdx; 
00121    ValueType m_lonIdx; 
00122 };
00123 
00124 inline ostream& operator << ( ostream& ostr, const TileIndex& index ) {
00125    ostr << index.getLatIdx() << ", " << index.getLonIdx();
00126    return ostr;
00127 }

00437    void getArgsForFeatureType(featureInt type,
00438                               vector<TileFeatureArg*>& args) const {
00439       if ( type < m_argsByTileFeatureTypeArraySize ) {
00440          
00441          const vector<TileFeatureArg*>& curVect =
00442             m_argsByTileFeatureTypeArray [type];
00443          
00444          args.reserve( curVect.size() );
00445          for ( vector<TileFeatureArg*>::const_iterator jt = 
00446                   curVect.begin(); jt != curVect.end(); ++jt ) {
00447             args.push_back( (*jt)->clone() );
00448          }
00449       }
00450    }
00451    
00452 
00458    uint32 getScaleIndexFromScale( uint32 scale ) const {
00459       scaleIndexByLevel_t::const_iterator findIt = 
00460          m_scaleIndexByLevel.upper_bound( scale );
00461       // MAX_UINT32 should always be present in the table.
00462       MC2_ASSERT( findIt != m_scaleIndexByLevel.end() );
00463       return findIt->second;
00464    }

00510       int latIdx, lonIdx;

00512                     coord.lat, coord.lon,
00513                     latIdx, lonIdx );

00515    }

00838 // --- Implementation of inlined methods. ---

00840 inline const CopyrightHolder& 
00841 TileMapFormatDesc::getCopyrightHolder() const 
00842 {
00843    return m_copyrightHolder;
00844 }
00845 
00846 inline bool 
00847 TileMapFormatDesc::isValidLayerID( uint32 layerID ) const {
00848    return m_layerNbrByID.find( layerID ) != m_layerNbrByID.end();
00849 }
00850 
00851 inline uint32 
00852 TileMapFormatDesc::getLayerNbrFromID( uint32 layerID ) const
00853 {
00854    map<uint32, uint32>::const_iterator it = m_layerNbrByID.find( layerID );
00855    MC2_ASSERT( it != m_layerNbrByID.end() );
00856    return it->second;
00857 }
00858 
00859 inline uint32
00860 TileMapFormatDesc::getNbrLayers() const
00861 {
00862    return m_layerIDsAndDesc.size();
00863 }
